item.title: FreeCodeCamp Algorithm Challenges
item.description: JavaScript Algorithms Today, we’re going to cover several of freeCodeCamp’s algorithm challenges from the Javascript Algorithms And Data Structures Certification. I’ll skip the first “Celsius to Fahrenheit” challenge. I just feel like there’s not much to explain there where you can find the conversion pretty much anywhere on the internet. Reverse a String Let’s start with the “Reverse the String” challenge. The first time I solved this challenge, I used a few JavaScript built-in functions and chained them together like so:
